issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `toUpperCase(Locale)` instead. For strings meant to be internal use `Locale.ROOT`, otherwise `Locale.getDefault()`.

Don't put classes in the io.embrace.android.embracesdk package unless they're part of the public API. Please move the new class to an appropriate package or (if you're adding to the public API) suppress this error via the lint baseline file.
